name: Ventris Jumpsuit Crusader Edition
name_cn: 文楚斯连身衣-十字军版
description:
Carrying Capacity: 1K µSCU
The Ventris is a sleek jumpsuit that mixes several rip and stain resistant polymer fabrics for a dynamic design. It also features a half-zip front and adjustable belt to ensure an ideal fit while the soft inner lining makes it an ideal choice for all day wear. The special Crusader Edition was made to be worn by employees of the company and features the sword and C logo on the front.
description_cn:
储物空间：1K µSCU
文楚斯是一件时髦的连身衣，多种抗皱防污聚合面料糅合在一起，带来了极富动感的设计。前方有半开拉链和可调节腰带以确保穿着合身，绵柔内衬让这件衣服成为全天候穿着的理想选择。十字军特别版专为公司雇员生产，前方印有十字军剑型标志。
